ComicInfo.Series: Victor Crowley's Hatchet Halloween Tales V
ComicInfo.Summary: The midnight hour is close at hand! Everyone's favorite slasher is back with brand-new terrifying bloody tales of Halloween to enjoy this holiday season. This year's issue is the biggest yet! Three new frightening tales narrated by the dismembered victims of Victor Crowley. Join us for an issue packed with comics, extras, and Halloween horror from start to finish! This is more gore for your buck than any other comic book! Spend Halloween in Honey Island Swamp this year and watch out for Victor Crowley!
ComicInfo.Notes: Info from Publisher site and Indicia
ComicInfo.Writer: James Kuhoric,Cullen Bunn,Konstantine Paradias,S. A. Check
